short_summary: Supply, delivery and support documentation for 2 TELE HANDLERS
description: National Research Council of Canada (NRC) has a requirement the Supply, delivery and support documentation for qty 1 of: a New rough terrain telehandler and qty 1 of: a Used rough terrain telehandler for operation in an outdoor workplace, to be delivered to the National Research Council - Dominion Radio Astrophysical Observatory, 717 White Lake Rd, Kaleden BC. Bidders may bid on one or both of ITEMS 1 and 2.  Each item will be evaluated separately.
duration_in_months: With contract start date: 2023-03-01, with duration
